example.ex: She alleged that there was rampant drug use among the male members of the group...
example.tran: 她声称该团体中有大量的男性成员吸毒。

example.ex: The accused is alleged to have killed a man...
example.tran: 被告据称谋杀了一名男子。

example.ex: It was alleged that the restaurant discriminated against black customers.
example.tran: 据称该饭馆歧视黑人顾客。

value.def: If you allege that something bad is true, you say it but do not prove it.
value.tran: （未提出证据而）断言，指称，声称
